description:
Query a Notion database with filtering and sorting. The input should be a JSON string containing the 'filter' and 'sorts' objects. Example input:
{"filter": {"property": "Status", "select": {"equals": "Done"}}, "sorts": [{"timestamp": "created_time", "direction": "descending"}]}

inputs.name: database_id
inputs.info: The ID of the Notion database to query.

inputs.name: query_json
inputs.info: A JSON string containing the filters and sorts that will be used for querying the database. Leave empty for no filters or sorts.
